title: Ways to Avoid Staring at Your Phone Before Bed
text: Staring into screens at night can disrupt our sleep-wake cycles. Many experts recommend avoiding smartphones in the hour before bedâ€”but that can be easier said than done. In this episode of If Our Bodies Could Talk , James Hamblin proposes an approach that might soon be sweeping the nation, and maybe the world: The Amazing Hour.
